page.title: 13Shops in Great Broughton
page.content:
{Shopping facilities in Gt.Broughton.
The shops in Gt.Broughton sell a variety of goods. People rely on the shops for everyday things and are able to buy bread,fresh fruit,vegetables and meat. Dairy products are sold in two shops. Stationery and gifts are sold at the Post Office. Ice-cream, sweets and soft drinks are on sale in all three shops.
Most people walked to the shop. One person came on their bicycle. Some people shop locally, weekly, daily or casually. One person said they shopped for ice-cream mostly and one girl said sweets. Others just said daily groceries. Most people visit large supermarkets in Stokesley or Middlesbrough and told us that they would miss the local village shops.
